common.hero_sub_heading_text: Master in-demand job skills for free and boost your career. Get personalized learning paths and apply directly for internships that match your ambitions. Start your journey toward a successful career with the power of AI at your side.
common.hero_testimonial_text: The process of getting my student pratikum was painless and seamless. I had the whole process completed in minutes.
common.trusted_by_leading: Trusted by leading brands and startups

landing_talent.title: Master in-demand job skills
landing_talent.subtitle: We are the largest, globally-distributed network of top business, design, and technology talent, ready to tackle your most important initiatives.
landing_talent.description_developers: Seasoned software engineers, coders, and architects with expertise across hundreds of technologies.
landing_talent.description_marketing_experts: Experts in digital marketing, growth marketing, content creation, market research, brand strategy execution, social media marketing, and more.
landing_talent.description_designers: Creative professionals who specialize in visual aesthetics, user experiences, and brand identity.
landing_talent.description_engineers: Problem solvers and innovators working on technology and systems that drive efficiency and productivity.
landing_talent.description_product_managers: Leaders who drive product vision, strategy, and execution in various markets.
landing_talent.description_content_creators: Skilled individuals who produce engaging and informative content across multiple platforms.

on_demands.title:

on_demands.subtitle: Quickly assemble the teams you need, exactly when you need them.

object.on_demand_hire_quickly_description: Hire in under 48 hours. Scale up or down, no strings attached. We offer flexible engagements from hourly to full-time.
object.on_demand_top_3_percent_description: Every applicant to the Toptal network is rigorously tested and vetted. Our highly selective process leads to a 98% trial-to-hire success rate.
object.on_demand_leading_future_work_descriptio: Our network is ready for tomorrow's business challenges by embracing advanced and specialized skills including blockchain and AI.
object.on_demand_a_level_above_description: Every single freelancer in our global network embodies the highest levels of integrity, professionalism, and communication.
